alert.note: Alert for Cherry; Sheridan (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 14 at 3:28AM CDT until July 14 at 3:45AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 AM MDT FOR NORTHWESTERN CHERRY AND NORTHERN SHERIDAN COUNTIES... At 228 AM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 12 miles west of Merriman to 9 miles southeast of Rushville, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Gordon, Rushville, Hay Springs, White Clay, Clinton, Intersection of Highway 87 and Craven Creek Road, Big Hill, Billys Lake, Lone Butte, Irwin, Intersection of Beaver Creek Road and White Clay Creek Road, Intersection of Highway 87 and Larabee Road, Rock Hill, Pine Ridge, Hoover Lake, Metcalf State Wildlife Management Area, Morgan Lake, Highway 27 crossing the Niobrara River, Mount Maria and Intersection of Highway 20 and Irwin Road. This includes the following highways... Highway 20 between mile markers 74 and 130. Highway 250 between mile markers 37 and 48. Highway 61 between mile markers 204 and 222. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
